title: Trump threatens Iran with strikes over nuclear talks | 7NEWS
description: US President Donald Trump has issued renewed threats against Iran, demanding the country enter nuclear negotiations or face military strikes worse than Operation Midnight Hammer, which occurred in June last year following Israel's 12-day war with Iran. A large fleet of US warships is reportedly heading towards Iran. Iran's mission to the United Nations has responded stating readiness for dialogue based on mutual respect, but warned it would defend itself and respond like never before if pushed. description: A 60-year-old woman and a baby were transported to hospital after being struck by a vehicle at a Gold Coast intersection. title: Chinese authorities to help investigate baby coffee attack | 7NEWS
description: A 33-year-old Chinese national fled to China after allegedly pouring boiling coffee on nine-month-old baby Luca in Brisbane in August 2024, causing severe burns in what authorities describe as a random attack. Chinese authorities will travel to Brisbane to assist Queensland police with the investigation, despite no formal extradition treaty existing between Australia and China. The case may proceed through ad hoc extradition arrangements or the suspect could face charges in China under extraterritorial offence provisions. title: At least 16 properties destroyed by bushfire
description: An intense bushfire has destroyed at least 16 homes and burned through more than 11,000 hectares in Victoria's southwest. #bushfire #fire #blaze #victoria #burn

title: Bull shark season likely to last longer due to warmer ocean temperatures
description: Bull shark season is likely to last longer this year due to warmer ocean temperatures and murkier waters. #shark #bullshark #science #marinelife #ocean

title: Some older iPhone models unable to connect to mobile networks
description: iPhone users are being warned older devices from the 6 to the 12 and SE may no longer connect to mobile networks. #iphone #apple #tech #phone #software
